description: Create a progress tracking command for Ralph work items that displays status, completion info, and metrics. This provides visibility into which work items are completed, in progress, or pending.
steps: Add logic to read all work items from config/prd.json
Query git log for Ralph-related commits to match work items
Generate formatted table showing: category, status, timestamp, commit SHA
Add status calculation logic: pending (not in progress.txt), completed (in progress.txt with commit), failed (in progress.txt without success)
Add optional JSON export flag for programmatic access
Test with current prd.json work items
Commit with message: 'feat(ralph): add progress tracking dashboard'
passes: Shows all work items from prd.json with accurate status
Completed work items show commit SHA and timestamp
Output is clearly formatted and easy to read
Works when run from workspace root
Status correctly identifies: pending, in-progress, completed, failed states
